name: Paras
flavorText:
Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.

previous.name: Vileplume
previous.flavorText:
It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

next.name: Parasect
next.flavorText:
A host-parasite
pair in which the
parasite mushroom has taken over the
host bug. Prefers
damp places.
